MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL72 postcode area of Moelfre. It  was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30PM as repairs are required to a broken piece of equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:50PM on Saturday 5th December 2020
